page.title: 04JOBS IN MURTON
page.content: The main employer in Murton is the { {National Coal Board.}There is Murton Colliery and a separate Hawthorn Coke Works which converts coal from the colliery.For over 100 years the colliery has been the focal point of the village, but now, the number of miners who live outside Murton greatly exceeds those who live in the village.In recent months the coke works (run for the N.C.B.by {Sunbrite {Smokeless Fuels }) have decided to concentrate their resources in other plants and the coke works is to close.The colliery has recently found it touch and go whether it would remai n open,but it seems that they have been reprieved for at least another 5 years.There is a{Northern General {Transport}bus depot and two busy haulage firms.Most other people leave the village to work,except those in
